caption.p: (A) Effect of compound 12c at different time points on apoptosis in MCF-7 cells analysed by flow cytometry after double staining of the cells with Annexin-V-FITC and PI. MCF-7 cells treated with 50 and 250 nM of compound 12c and 50 nM of CA-4 for 24 h, 48 h and 72 h and collected and processed for analysis. (B) Quantitative analysis of apoptosis. Values represent the mean ± SEM for three independent experiments. Statistical analysis was performed using two-way ANOVA (* p < 0.05** and p < 0.01; *** p < 0.001).
